ygData.msgSnippet: I have been contacted by my allies. The ark has been destroyed. We have not been destroyed but i dont know how. All I know is it must be rebuilt. My destron

Message-ID: <75.b2e6050.27236884@...>

Subject: Re: Contact with KIT KAT
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 103
From: kinger01030@...

  "I have been contacted by my allies. The ark has been destroyed. We have 
not been destroyed but i dont know how. All I know is it must be rebuilt. My 
destron friend Sphink has already contacted you. His destron forces have 
already agreeded to help the maximals rebuild the ark. I fwe do so we will 
save history and help us win over the maximals favor. I know you do not like 
the maximals but if we are to take down the alliance we will need the 
maximals. Now we will also need the help of your troops to rebuild the ark. 
My spy..is Ultra Magnus. The former comander of the autobots. And he is ready 
to go under your command."
